=== Logs ===

Talk to Rocket2DMn and he will create a page for logs of previous teachings and post links here.  You need to give him the log, or he will create an empty page for you.

If you are holding a session, feel free to contact <nowiki>[[nhandler]]</nowiki> about having <nowiki>[[VoteBot]]</nowiki> log the session. The logs can then easily be added to this archive.
